Text: Sometimes I’d wake up early out of habit but I almost always go back to sleep. I’d skip meals & oversleep till noon, or worse. Then I’d wake up feeling groggy, I’d take a shower and my first meal of the day, looking at the time, thinking I’ve wasted half of my Saturday 😔
